Method Detail

readCML

public static void readCML(java.lang.String[] args)
read a CML file and report. if the file has a top element in the current CML namespace this will be created as a CML class, else simply a nu.xom.Element args: of form "readCML" args1, arg2... if args[1] = -HELP, issue help, else args[1] is filename to read exceptions are repoerted in situ

Parameters:
args -

makeCML

public static void makeCML(java.lang.String[] args)
make a CML file and write to file. args: of form "makeCML" args1, arg2... if args[1] = -HELP, issue help, else args[1] is filename to write exceptions are reported in situ

Parameters:
args -

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
main will run simple apps.

Parameters:
args - if none outputs help; else runs test of name args[0]
